
nodename_to_node(+Graph, +NodeName, -Node)

   Retrieves the node number given a node name

Arguments
   Graph               a graph structure
   NodeName            ground data, usually node name
   Node                an integer node number

Type
   library(graph_algorithms)

Description

    

Fail Conditions
   Fails if no node name information is available

See Also
   node_to_nodename / 3, nodes_to_nodenames / 3, nodenames_to_nodes / 3
